text: I have this really cool recipe for chai Indian tea  that used to belong to my grandmother  Ingredients    cardamon pods  crushed    star anise   Fresh    inch knob of ginger if you like tea that s gingery  Whole milk Don t use skim milk it will taste very watery  Strong black tea it should take less than   min to make How   make the  ea  Crush cardamom pods if you haven t yet  Fetch your star anise too  In a pot  pour equal parts water and milk and get it nice and bubbly  Slice the ginger into thin slices  Add everything to the pot except black tea  Keep a close watch on the pot  when bubbles start to form on the edges  then you put in     tablespoons of black tea  Mix mixture around a bit  As the temperature of the tea rises  it should turn into an orangeish brown color  When that happens  simmer the tea for   minutes  Add some sugar to taste and mix  I always add in less than I need because I can always add sugar when the tea is in the cup  Strain tea into your vessel of choice or not if you feel lazy  Drink  tea goes well with a salty snack like a cold cut sandwich or some biscuits  Don t burn your tongue too
summary: The recipe for chai Indian tea used to belong to my grandmother. It's easy to make and takes less than a minute to prepare. It goes well with salty snacks like cold cut sandwiches or biscuits and is good for the tongue.

text: Just need to say what s on my mindI don t have anyone that I feel comfortable talking about this with face to face   Since I can remember  I ve been the happy girl in my family  I have three sisters  I do believe the women in my family have mental illnesses that need to be addressed  but this whole time I ve thought that this didn t apply to me  I thought I was happy and able to deal with my feelings  But not anymore  Recently  I started to become angry really easily  I get so mad  So mad to the point that I physically am drained of energy  the anger consumes my every thought  I am awake and thinking about different situations in my life and how everything is turned against me  I go to sleep  and I have dreams that just progress my anger while I m asleep  I wake up  angry  I can t breathe  I m sick to the stomach  And now  I ve felt a need to deal with this  But I feel alone  I don t want anyone to know  I don t want to tell my sisters  because I don t want them to tell anyone  I don t want to tell my friends because I m afraid that they won t care  I don t want to to even talk about it within my own head  I just want it to be over  I want it to end  I need relief but I don t know where or how it can come about  That s when I started to reddit and found a place that maybe someone can relate  My mind has been crying out for attention  but no one understands  I ve yet to take action to how I m feeling  but I m afraid about what will be my next move  I m exhausted  I m angry  I m sad  and I m alone
summary: A woman in her family is depressed and angry. She doesn't want to talk about it with anyone. She is afraid to tell her sisters or her friends. She started to look for a forum where she could talk about her feelings.
